wikipedia_page.main: Rudolph Grant, also known as Little Brother Grant, Rudy Grant and The Mexicano, is a reggae deejay and singer.

response: * Rudy Grant, a reggae DJ who has released albums under the stage name "The Mexicano"
*Rudy Grant as The Mexicano, recorded a reggae version and released "First of May" as a single in 1977 on Ice Records. The B-side, "Every Step I Made" was written by his brother Eddy Grant.
Famous people associated with the village include musician brothers Eddy Grant and Rudy Grant, as well as footballer Alex Bunbury who were born there.
